item.title: The WebP 0day
item.description:
Early last week, Google released a new stable update for Chrome. The update included a single security fix that was reported by Apple's Security Engineering and Architecture (SEAR) team. item.title: Today The UK Parliament Undermined The Privacy, Security, And Freedom Of All Internet Users
item.description: The U.K. Parliament has passed the Online Safety Bill (OSB), which says it will make the U.K. “the safest place” in the world to be online. In reality, the OSB will lead to a much more censored, locked-down internet for British users. The bill could empower the government to undermine not just the privacy and security of U.K. residents, but internet users worldwide.
item.author: (Joe Mullin)
